questions: No one can say names—if they do, they drink!
Everyone must drink with their non-dominant hand.
No one can point—if they do, they take a sip!
You must refer to yourself in the third person.
Anytime someone laughs, they take a drink.
No one can say the word “drink.”
If someone asks a question, they must take a sip.
No one can touch their phone—if they do, they drink!
Anytime someone curses, they take a shot.
Every time someone spins, they must cheers before drinking.
